title: Himbos Podcast (feat. Josh Adam Meyers & Justin Silver)
description:
The guys come up with a genius idea for a new podcast staring two Himbos, Josh Adam Meyers and Justin Silver and have them on the show to pitch them the idea.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayOakerson.com

@Josh Adam Meyers www.JoshAdamMeyers.com

@Justin Silver www.IAmJustinSilver

@HimbosPodcast
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (josh adam meyers, justin silver)
